title: "Hypnotic Love: Exploring the Power of Suggestions"
first_phrase: In the previous part of the text, the relationships between sweetness, tenderness, purity, and innocence were highlighted, and how they relate to our experiences as children. The cultural implications of this are also discussed, and how we tend to trust people whom we perceive as pure and innocent. In the last 200 tokens, the author discusses how to create the emotion of love through hypnosis, and how it can induce a state of consciousness where the subject is more susceptible to suggestions from their loved ones. The text explains the various methods of using hypnosis to induce the feeling of love.
content: Las alucinaciones que tenemos que crear para potenciar tal estado tienen un referente externo, en el sentido de que se trata de recuerdos de emociones ya experimentadas en el pasado a causa de situaciones observadas en el ambiente que nos rodea, pero que tienen también un fuerte componente interno, dado que nosotros ampliamos este estado de conciencia ( o parte de este ) hasta un nivel que sujeto no ha experimentado nunca hasta aquel momento, al proyectar o recibir este tipo de " aura " de amor hacia o por parte de una persona, sin modificar necesariamente la percepción visual, auditiva o cenestésica de esta última; esto no significa que no sea correcto aportar modificaciones al aspecto exterior de la persona que amamos, es solo que estos modificaciones cosméticas ( gracias a alucinaciones con referente externo) juegan con certeza un papel secundario cuando se está enamorado. Existen varios métodos con los que podemos instalar, mediante hipnosis, la emoción llamada amor.
last_phrase: In conclusion, inducing the emotion of love through hypnosis is possible and can be intensified by creating hallucinations based on memories of past experiences. The use of external references through modifications in appearance play a secondary role in love, while the internal component is crucial by projecting or receiving an aura of love towards the loved one. It is important to understand the power of suggestion and conditioning in amplifying the feeling of love but also to distinguish it from sexual arousal.
